accessibility.text: Wait, it’s just a normalizing flow?
Back to diffusion: the probability flow ODE
For any diffusion process, there exists a corresponding deterministic process whose trajectories share the same marginal probability densities ￼ as the SDE [Song et al 2021]
Wait, it’s just a normalizing flow?
Back to diffusion: the probability flow ODE
For any diffusion process, there exists a corresponding deterministic process whose trajectories share the same marginal probability densities ￼ as the SDE [Song et al 2021]
Wait, it’s just a normalizing flow?
Back to diffusion: the probability flow ODE
Diffusion models are just normalizing flows trained in a “simulation-free” way by score/noise-matching!
For any diffusion process, there exists a corresponding deterministic process whose trajectories share the same marginal probability densities ￼ as the SDE [Song et al 2021]
